title: Kyc Notice En
text:
None
1. Why We Ask for Your Documents FinSight Bank must identify all clients before opening or maintaining an account under the Know Your Customer (KYC) framework. This helps protect you and the financial system from fraud, money laundering, and terrorism financing. Verification ensures secure and compliant transactions in line with Tunisian and international regulations.

title: Kyc Notice En
text:
None
2. What We Verify FinSight verifies your identity, residence, source of income or funds, and beneficial ownership if representing another person or entity.

rows.values: Type of Client:Individual (Resident), Mandatory Documents:National ID or Passport + Proof of Residence + Proof of Income
Type of Client:Non‑Resident, Mandatory Documents:Passport + Residence Permit + Proof of Address Abroad + Source of Funds
Type of Client:Company / Legal Entity, Mandatory Documents:Certificate of Incorporation + Statutes + Tax ID + Shareholders List + Manager ID
Type of Client:Association or NGO, Mandatory Documents:Legal Recognition Decree + Board Resolution + Representative ID

title: Kyc Notice En
text:
None
4. How We Protect Your Information Your personal data are confidential and processed in compliance with Law No. 2004‑63, the Bank’s Data Protection Policy, and BCT regulations. Information is never shared without legal authorization. Access is restricted to authorized staff and stored securely.

title: Kyc Notice En
text:
None
5. How Often We Update Your Information FinSight may request updated documents when your ID or address changes, when opening new products, or when transactions are large or unusual. Keeping your data current avoids service interruptions or delays.

title: Kyc Notice En
text:
None
6. Your Rights You may access, correct, or update your personal data anytime by contacting your branch or Customer Relations Department: Phone: +216 71 000 123 Email: kyc@finsightbank.tn

title: Kyc Notice En
text:
None
7. Our Commitment FinSight handles your information with care, professionalism, and respect. By fulfilling KYC requirements, you contribute to a secure and transparent banking system.
